com.parkingtycoon.views.components

Class HudLineDiagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.views.components.HudDiagram
      • com.parkingtycoon.views.components.HudLineDiagram

  • public class HudLineDiagram
extends HudDiagram
    This class is responsible for extending the HudDiagram with a line diagram.
    Author:
    Timo Strating
